name: NightFalcon
description: Born from the darkness, NightFalcon is a master of stealth, equipped with enhanced night vision and the ability to fly silently through the night sky.

name: Ms. Quantum
description: Ms. Quantum has the power to manipulate atomic and subatomic particles, allowing her to phase through objects, emit energy blasts, and even teleport.

name: AquaMystic
description: A guardian of the deep seas, AquaMystic can breathe underwater, communicate with marine life, and harness the power of the ocean to create formidable water constructs.

name: SolarVixen
description: Drawing energy from the sun, SolarVixen can harness solar beams, heat up objects instantly, and illuminate even the darkest of places.

name: ThunderScribe
description: Gifted with the ancient script of storms, ThunderScribe can inscribe runes that summon lightning, turbulent winds, and rain. He also has an encyclopedic knowledge of all written languages.

name: GemGuardian
description: With a heart of crystal, GemGuardian can generate and manipulate gemstones, using them for defense, offense, and even healing.

name: MysticBlade
description: Wielding a sword forged from the cosmic abyss, MysticBlade can slice through any material and even open portals to other dimensions.

name: WispWhirl
description: A master of illusions, WispWhirl can become intangible, create duplicates of herself, and cast mesmerizing spells that befuddle her enemies.

name: BreezeRunner
description: BreezeRunner has the ability to create gentle gusts of wind, helping him glide short distances and divert light projectiles.

name: GlowBug
description: GlowBug can emit a soft luminescent glow, illuminating dark areas. She also has an innate understanding of insects and can communicate with them to gather information.

name: StoneShaper
description: StoneShaper has the ability to mold and shape small rocks and stones with his hands, creating tools, weapons, or simple sculptures.

name: Awesome Lightning Guy
description: The God of Awesome Lightning Conjuration and Expulsion

name: Ant-Man
description: Can be really small or really big.
